snippet: Edwina Rogers, a Republican lobbyist, said she was given no warning by the Secular Coalition for America, for which she had worked for two years.
abstract: Secular Coalition for America, alliance of atheists and nonbelievers from across country, dismisses its executive director, Edwina Rogers, experienced Republican lobbyist whose conservative pedigree elevated the profile of the secular movement when she was hired just over two years ago.

byline.original: By LAURIE GOODSTEIN and MARK OPPENHEIMER

lead_paragraph: Edwina Rogers, a Republican lobbyist, said she was given no warning by the Secular Coalition for America, for which she had worked for two years.

headline.main: Secular Group, on Eve of Big Meeting, Fires Top Official Who Elevated Its Profile
headline.print_headline: Secular Group, on Eve of Big Meeting, Fires Top Official Who Elevated Its Profile
